General.Name: BK Brasil Operação e Assessoria a Restaurantes S.A
General.Description: ZAMP S.A. develops, operates, and franchisees restaurants under the Burger King and POPEYES names in Brazil. It also provides advisory and support services to Burger King restaurants, as well as sells, imports, and exports related products. As of September 30, 2021, the company had 674 Burger King restaurants; and 49 POPEYES restaurants. The company was formerly known as BK Brasil Operação e Assessoria a Restaurantes S.A. ZAMP S.A. was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Barueri, Brazil.

1.Name: Gabriel Magalhaes da Rocha Guimaraes
1.Title: CFO, Investor Relations VP & Member of Exec. Board
